Container.Name: Home-Assistant-Control-Panel
Container.Overview: Using a phone or tablet device you can hook into your Home Assistant server and get access to a simple to use Control Panel. Mount the device on your wall to create the ultimate home automation accessory and unlock the true potential of your Smart devices. API Setup Instruction: https://reformedreality.com/home-assistant-control-panel#api-setup
Container.DonateText: If you like it, then consider buying me a soda as I don't like beer :P
